title: ConcentrationLimit
description: Represents a class to describe concentration limits that may be applicable to eligible collateral criteria.

concentrationLimitCriteria.description: Specifies a set of criteria to describe the assets that the concentration limits apply to.

valueLimit.description: Specifies the value of collateral limit represented as a range.

percentageLimit.description: Specifies the perecentage of collateral limit represented as a decimal number - example 25% is 0.25.
